snippet: Denmark has been one of the countries most committed to the effort in Afghanistan, losing more soldiers per capita than any other European army. But a growing number of Danes think a retreat with dignity is the best the West can hope for.
abstract: Denmark has been one of the countries most committed to the effort in Afghanistan, losing more soldiers per capita than any other European army. But a growing number of Danes think a retreat with dignity is the best the West can hope for.

headline.main: Afghanistan: When Even the Danes Turn on the War...
